com.teamwork.autocomplete.adapter

Interface TypeAdapterDelegate<M>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NullTypeAdapterDelegate

    public interface TypeAdapterDelegate<M>
    Internal use interface for a type adapter.

    Used by MultiAutoComplete's main adapter to delegate filtering to one of the registered type adapters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCount()
      Get the current count of filtered items in the type adapter.
      TokenFilter<M> getFilter()
      Return the typed TokenFilter for this type adapter.
      M getItem(int position)
      Return the item at the passed position in the type adapter.
      long getItemId(int position)
      Return the item identifier as specified by Adapter.getItemId(int).
      android.view.View getView(android.view.LayoutInflater inflater, int position, android.view.View convertView, android.view.ViewGroup parent, java.lang.CharSequence constraint)
      Retrieve the view for the given position using the inflater or the view holder associated to the view itself, and binds the data to it.
      void onTextChanged(java.lang.CharSequence text)
      Called by the MultiAutoCompleteTextView when the text typed by the user has changed.
      java.util.List<M> performFiltering(java.lang.CharSequence constraint)
      Called by Filter#performFiltering(CharSequence) off the main thread to filter the list in this type adapter based on the passed constraint.
      void registerDataSetObserver(android.database.DataSetObserver observer) 
      void setFilteredItems(java.util.List<M> items)
      Set the list of currently filtered items into the type adapter.

      • setFilteredItems

        @MainThread
void setFilteredItems(@NonNull
                                  java.util.List<M> items)
        Set the list of currently filtered items into the type adapter. This will be called by the Filter.performFiltering(CharSequence) method.
        Parameters:
        items - A list of items to set in the adapter.

      • getCount

        @MainThread
int getCount()
        Get the current count of filtered items in the type adapter.

      • getItem

        @MainThread
 @NonNull
M getItem(int position)
        Return the item at the passed position in the type adapter.
        Parameters:
        position - The position in the adapter.
        Returns:
        The item.

      • getItemId

        @MainThread
long getItemId(int position)
        Return the item identifier as specified by Adapter.getItemId(int).
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the item.
        Returns:
        The numeric identifier of the item at the passed position.

      • getView

        @NonNull
android.view.View getView(@NonNull
                                   android.view.LayoutInflater inflater,
                                   int position,
                                   @Nullable
                                   android.view.View convertView,
                                   @NonNull
                                   android.view.ViewGroup parent,
                                   @Nullable
                                   java.lang.CharSequence constraint)
        Retrieve the view for the given position using the inflater or the view holder associated to the view itself, and binds the data to it.
        Parameters:
        inflater - The LayoutInflater for inflating the view.
        position - The adapter position of the view to retrieve.
        convertView - The convert view passed by the adapter.
        parent - The view parent for view inflation.
        constraint - The current text constraint to pass the view binder.
        Returns:
        The view for the element at the passed position.
        See Also:
        Adapter.getView(int, View, ViewGroup)

      • getFilter

        @NonNull
TokenFilter<M> getFilter()
        Return the typed TokenFilter for this type adapter.

      • performFiltering

        @WorkerThread
 @NonNull
java.util.List<M> performFiltering(@NonNull
                                                           java.lang.CharSequence constraint)
        Called by Filter#performFiltering(CharSequence) off the main thread to filter the list in this type adapter based on the passed constraint.
        Parameters:
        constraint - A text constraint to filter the adapter elements.
        Returns:
        A List of filtered items from this adapter.

      • onTextChanged

        @MainThread
void onTextChanged(@NonNull
                               java.lang.CharSequence text)
        Called by the MultiAutoCompleteTextView when the text typed by the user has changed.
        Parameters:
        text - The text currently present in the editable text view.
